alert.note: Alert for Bourbon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 10:44AM CDT until June 02 at 2:09PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from excessive rainfall earlier today continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kansas, including the following county, Bourbon. * WHEN...Until noon CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1042 AM CDT, gauge reports indicated that between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Scott, Bronson, Uniontown, Fulton, Redfield, Marmaton, Mapleton and Devon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
